original_text: And God came unto Balaam at night, and said unto him, If the men come to call thee, rise up, and go with them; but yet the word which I shall say unto thee, that shalt thou do.
korean_text: 밤에 하나님이 발람에게 임하여 이르시되 그 사람들이 너를 부르러 왔거든 일어나 함께 가라 그러나 내가 네게 이르는 말만 준행할지니라

sentences.original_text: And God came unto Balaam at night
If the men come to call thee
rise up, and go with them
but yet the word which I shall say unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 네게 말할 그 말씀
